author: Pam Key, Pam Key
title: MSNBC's Figliuzzi: Trump 'Exploiting a Virus to Dismantle the Rule of Law and the Constitution'
description: Tuesday on MSNBC's "Deadline," former FBI official and MSNBC national security contributor Frank Figliuzzi accused President Donald Trump of "exploiting" the coronavirus pandemic. | Clips
content:
Tuesday on MSNBC’s “Deadline,” former FBI official and MSNBC national security contributor Frank Figliuzzi accused President Donald Trump of “exploiting” the coronavirus pandemic.
He claimed  Trump was working “to dismantle the rule of law and the Constituti… [+2502 chars]
